title: Integrative Medicine - Metaplastic Breast Cancer Global Alliance
description: Information provided by the Metaplastic Breast Cancer Global Alliance on integrative medicine which may assist in the treatment of metaplastic breast cancer or in the side effects of its treatment.
cleaned_text: Complementary and Integrative Medicine While still a controversial area, complementary and integrative medicine is gaining more public awareness and support as experts explore new ways to treat disease, mind, body and spirit. Treating the whole person not just the disease deserves a partnership between the patient and doctor. It is an area that is also being explored to help in the treatment of metaplastic breast cancer. Link to the National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health. [https://nccih.nih.gov/about](https://nccih.nih.gov/about) Link to the National Institute of Health/ Office of Dietary Supplements.
